name: Burst
display_help: Quickly fires a Burst of rounds at a single target at very long range. Damage is average, but the fire rate is fast. Can also reduce the target's defense. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Toxic), Foe -DEF
display_target_help: Your Defense has been reduced by the Assault Rifle.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Toxic damage over time.

name: Slug
display_help: Fires a single Slug at a targeted foe. Firing a single Slug is slower than firing a Burst, but deals more damage, is longer range, and can knock down foes. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Lethal), Minor DoT (Toxic), Foe Knockback

display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Lethal/Smash), Minor DoT (Toxic), Knockback

display_help: You fire a single blast from your beam rifle, causing energy damage and lowering your target's regeneration rate. There is also a chance that you will knock your target down.
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG (Energy), -Regen (Foe) Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
display_target_help: Your regeneration has been reduced.

name: Charged_Shot
display_help: You charge up your beam rifle and fire a concentrated blast of energy at a single target. This causes energy damage and lowers your target's recovery. There is also a chance that your target may be knocked down.
display_short_help: Ranged, High DMG(Energy), -Rec (Foe), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
display_target_help: Your recovery has been reduced.

name: Cutting_Beam
display_help: You fire a constant stream of energy from your weapon, sweeping it in a broad arc to blast all foes in a wide cone in front of you. This causes energy damage and lowers the defense of affected targets. There is a chance that your target will continue to suffer energy damage briefly after the initial burst of energy damage.
display_short_help: Ranged (Cone), Moderate DMG(Energy), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Minor DoT (Energy)
display_target_help: Your defenses have been reduced. There is a chance you may also be suffering energy damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage over time.

name: Piercing_Beam
display_help: You fire a supercharged beam of energy in a narrow cone that pierces up to 3 enemies. Each affected enemy suffers energy damage and reduced resistance to all forms of damage. There is also a chance that there is an additional burst of energy that causes extra energy damage on a target.
display_short_help: Ranged (Narrow Cone), High DMG (Energy), -RES (Foe, All), Chance for Moderate DMG (Energy)
display_target_help: Your resistance to all forms of damage has been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Energy damage.

name: Crushing_Field
display_help: Creates a large gravitational field strong enough to Immobilize multiple foes. Crushing Field can also bring down flying entities. Slower and less damaging than Crush, but can capture multiple targets. Crushing Field deals Smashing damage over time and can Slow the movement of targets that escape its grasp. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Minor DoT(Smash), Foe Immobilize, -Fly
display_target_help: You are being Crushed. You cannot move or fly.

name: Singularity
display_help: You can create a very powerful Gravitational Singularity. The Singularity will engage your foes, assaulting them with various gravity powers. Any foes that attempt to approach the Singularity will be violently hurled away. The Singularity cannot be healed, but is highly resistant to all forms of damage and nearly impervious to Controlling type powers. Recharge: Very Long

name: Family_Bonds
display_help: You mend the wounds of yourself and nearby allies by placing your bodies in a past or future state where they are far less injured. Temporal Mending will immediately heal its targets and continue to heal them for an equal amount over the next 6 seconds. Additionally, affected allies will gain some resistance to slow effects and regeneration debuffs. Allies affected by the Accelerated effect will receive additional healing from this power. Temporal Mending will apply a regeneration bonus instead of heal over time for a short while if the user is in a PvP zone. Recharge: Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Heal (Self and Allies), HoT (Self and Allies), +RES(Slow, Regen Debuff)

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} health with {PowerName}.
{PlayerSource} continually heals you for {Damage} health with {PowerName}.

name: Targeting_Drone
display_help: When this small device is activated, the small Targeting Drone hovers around your head and emits targeting laser sights. The lasers can dramatically improve your chance to hit and increase your Perception, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Targeting Drone also grants you resistance to powers that DeBuff your chance to hit. While in use, any sniper rifle shots you make will do additional damage. This is a toggle power and must be activated and deactivated manually. Like all toggle powers, while active, the Targeting Drone drains Endurance. Recharge: Slow
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} increases your chance to hit.

name: Training
display_help: You have a greater tolerance to pain than others. You are also slightly resistant to all types of damage. This power is always on and costs no Endurance.

name: 12_Gauge
display_help: Good at medium range. Longer range and more deadly than most Shotguns, The 12 Gauge Shotgun Fires a cone of buckshot pellets and can knock some foes down.

name: Agile_Sweep

display_help: You swing your weapon at your target with tremendous force. The blow causes smashing damage and internal trauma, which causes lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in movement speed and ability to fly.

name: Shockwave_Strike

display_target_help: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.

name: Painless
display_help: You have learned techniques from the Family which make you more resilient to pain and able to take more punishment before being defeated. When activated, you will gain a long boost to your maximum HP, a significant self heal and have a chance to boost your recovery and regeneration.

name: Arc_of_Devastation
display_help: You swing your weapon in a powerful arc which deals smashing damage to all in the way. There is also a chance that the target may be knocked down and stunned. If stunned, the opponent will also suffer reductions in attack speed and recharge rate.
display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockback(Foe), Stun(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)
display_target_help: Your attack speed and chance to hit have been reduced.

name: Business_Time
display_help: You have learned techniques from the Family which they call, 'it's Business Time'. When activated, you will gain resistance to all types of damage, increased Recovery and resistance to Knock, Repel, Sleep, Stun, Immobilization and Hold effects.
display_short_help: +RES(Self,All), +DEF(Self, All), +Rec(Self,All), Resistant to Knock, Repel, Sleep, Stun, Immobilize, Hold
